TopicTitle: Getting information from the VesselSpawnDialog aka LaunchPad/Runway GUI Dialog

Articles.Content:
I already search in the github, and looks like mods ignore the dialog, or have some kind of stub.

  • How to get chosed in the dialog: vessel (as ShipConstruct) and missionFlagURL (as string)?
     
  • How to get is it a Launchpad dialog or a Runway dialog?
     
  • Also I don't figure out how to get (and set) the list of vessels for filtering the list in the GUI,
    because VesselSpawnDialog.craftList relates to a steam crafts list, and not to a usual craft list in the GUI
